ValidationRule.description: Certain Closed Reasons are not allowed for Renewal Opps (Rebid/Extension).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Rebid"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Extension") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Closed_Reason__c, "Benchmarking"), ISPICKVAL(Closed_Reason__c, "Client Withdrawn"), ISPICKVAL(Closed_Reason__c, "Reason Pending") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Closed Reason is not allowed for Rebid/Extension Opportunities. Please choose a different Closed Reason and try again.
